title: Gluten-Free Recipe: Sweet Teff Pancakes
directions: Mix teff flour, baking powder, arrowroot powder, and sea salt in a large bowl. Add coconut oil, almond milk, vanilla extract, and sweetener. Mix until all ingredients are combined.
Pour a 1/8 – 1/4 cup of batter onto griddle.
Flip pancakes when bubbles begin to form on top of pancake and bottoms are golden brown.
Serve with pure maple syrup and fresh strawberries.
Makes 15 pancakes. Freeze leftovers for a healthy grab-and-go breakfast.
ingredients: OPTIONAL: 1-2 Tablespoons honey or vegan sweetener of choice
